welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Juan, Costa Rica! Get ready to soak up the charm of this vibrant city known for its lush rainforests, stunning beaches, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that San Juan has to offer!"

restaurants.name: Patucannay's Best
restaurants.description: Patucannay's Best is a soup spot located in Bangued.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
